alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 11:38AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN CITRUS...CENTRAL SUMTER...PASCO...HERNANDO AND HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM EDT... At 1137 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from South Brooksville to near Macdill Air Force Base. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Dade City, Bushnell, Fish Hawk, Lutz, Brandon, St. Leo, Weeki Wachee, South Brooksville, Zephyrhills South, North Brooksville, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, and Hernando County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
